text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Nice comments? From ur mostly uneducated crowd? U were horrible. Ur speech was unhinged, screwing up facts, u were divisive & hateful. Never mentioned the 130k+ Americans, COVID-19 victims who’ve died, nor anything about Putin who paid money 2 have our troops killed. U r the pits
